products.name: DeWalt 20V MAX Hammer Drill
products.description: Powerful cordless hammer drill for drilling into concrete, brick, and masonry. Features 20V MAX battery system with long runtime.

products.name: Makita 18V LXT Drill Driver
products.description: Compact and lightweight drill driver for everyday drilling and driving tasks. Variable speed trigger for precise control.

products.name: Milwaukee M18 Circular Saw
products.description: 7-1/4 inch circular saw with brushless motor for efficient cuts through lumber and plywood. Includes blade guard and dust port.

products.name: Bosch Jigsaw with T-Shank Blades
products.description: Versatile jigsaw for curved and straight cuts in wood, metal, and plastic. Low vibration design for comfortable use.

products.name: Estwing 16oz Claw Hammer
products.description: Professional grade steel claw hammer with shock-absorbing grip. Perfect for framing and general carpentry work.

products.name: Stanley FatMax Framing Hammer
products.description: Heavy-duty 22oz framing hammer with anti-vibration technology. Milled face for secure nail grip.

products.name: Klein Tools 11-in-1 Screwdriver
products.description: Multi-bit screwdriver with 11 different tips stored in the handle. Includes Phillips, slotted, square, and Torx bits.

products.name: Stanley 25ft PowerLock Tape Measure
products.description: Professional tape measure with 25 foot blade and blade lock. Wide blade stays rigid for long measurements.

products.name: 3M WorkTunes Hearing Protector
products.description: Bluetooth hearing protection with AM/FM radio. Noise reduction rating of 24dB for loud work environments.

products.name: Carhartt Insulated Work Gloves
products.description: Durable insulated work gloves with reinforced palm. Water-resistant and touchscreen compatible fingertips.
